response.overview: Made in 30 days, fully in Blender 3D, by 1 woman for a short film competition. A surreal take on sci-fi tropes. Follows an underground dealer and a woman in a Dystopian reality, where implants give normal citizens a moment of respite from their dreadful lives.
response.tagline: Take a peek into the ordinary lives of citizens in this Dystopian reality. Follow an underground dealer as he delivers a mind altering implant to a struggling woman.
response.title: Mind Bug
